item.title: 001 Start
item.description:
The beggining of my vlog

Idk what to sayl I’m just starting this Hugo website because I have so much to say and there is so much absence of smart people in my life that I need somewhere to share my coding adventures and talking shit about windows, web dev, stupid people, VS code users, platform IO users, internet users, oxygen users and so, like a Twitter but actually interesting and with bit manipulation included and a superiority condition that u cannot claim to be false.
